title: Inma Youjo (The Erotic Temptress)
synopsis: Maya is a force of nature: wherever she goes, havoc and destruction follows. Men lose control, and become her playthings; while women become so jealous they are led to their doom. Each episode is a tale of a different Maya in a different world.
staff: [['Tominaga, Tsuneo', ['Script', ' Screenplay']], ['Nagamori, Yoshihiro', ['Key Animation']], ['Shibata, Shirou', ['Key Animation']], ['Ike, Nobutaka', ['Art Director']]]
